description:
Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) systems are used for companies of all size and within any industry to record their business activities. By understanding concepts of ERP systems and business processes, you will be able to differentiate ERP systems from other business systems. You will be able to make critical decisions accurately when you company is changing business systems or upgrading to ERP systems.

Completing the course will take approximately 90 minutes.
title: Enterprise Resource Planning in 90 minutes
